title: Deputies: Man accidentally kills teen while acting out music lyrics
content:
A Merritt Island man was charged with accidentally shooting and killing a 17-year-old while they were listening to music, a Brevard County Sheriff's spokesman said.
Rodney Patrick Jr., 22, was in his home listening to music with Douglas Winslow Monday night when the shooting occurred, said Major Tod Goodyear, a sheriff's office spokesman.
Patrick, acting out the lyrics of a song, picked up a firearm he thought was not loaded and pointed it at Winslow, Goodyear said. The firearm discharged, killing Winslow, Goodyear said.
Patrick was charged with manslaughter, tampering with evidence, and possession of alprazolam, also known as Xanax. He is being held without a bond in Brevard County Jail.
Anyone with more information about the shooting can call the Brevard County Sheriff's Office at 321-633-7162 or Crimeline at 1-800-423-8477.
glotan@orlandosentinel.com or 407-420-5774
